data.title: First & Only Commercial LaserWeeder™
data.meta_description: Carbon Robotics builds the industry-leading AI-powered LaserWeeder™. LaserWeeder combines computer vision, AI deep learning technology, robotics, and lasers to identify crops versus weeds - and shoots the weeds with lasers. LaserWeeding cuts weed control costs by 80%, boosts crop yield and quality,
data.text:
PROTECTING CROPS, PEOPLE, & OUR PLANET

AI-Powered + Chemical Free + Improved Soil Health

BUILDING THE FARMS AND FOOD SYSTEMS OF OUR FUTURE WITH FARMERS today.

FLEETS WORLDWIDE OPERATING 24/7

Trusted By TOP GROWERS

CARBON ECOSYSTEM

Reimagining how we produce food by leveraging the power of computer vision, AI/deep learning, robotics, and lasers.

LASERWEEDER

Powered by Nvidia GPUs

42 High-resolution cameras identifying and targeting weeds

Deep-learning-based computer vision models

30X 150W CO2 lasers with sub-millimeter accuracy

The LaserWeeder is connected to the tractor's 3-point hitch, powered by the tractor’s PTO, and controlled through our user-friendly iPad Operator App.

CARBON OPERATOR APP

Our intuitive app makes operating LaserWeeder easy.

One-touch access to world-class support and rapid response 7 days a week

See how LaserWeeder is performing in real time.

CARBON OPS CENTER

Weed Density, Weed Type, Average Weed Radius, Crop Density, Average Crop Radius

See your crop stand count in the Carbon Ops Center.

Get detailed reports on performance, usage, coverage, etc.

COMPANION APP

Keep up to date with your team and support

Get real-time LaserWeeder status and location from anywhere

Crop and Weed Metrics: Count, Density, Size, Type. Performance and Usage Metrics: Acres Covered, Weeds Killed, Travel Speed, Total Performance

Better than hand weeding, spraying, or mechanical weeding

ORDER now

What is laserweeding?

Laserweeding is precision weed control for commercial farming.

Laserweeding kills weeds at the meristem before they compete for precious resources.

Crops grow healthier when they aren’t fighting weeds for water, nutrients, and sunlight.

Learn More

Carbon Robotics in the news

Image Gallery

Carbon Robotics on NBC Nightly News

People are talking about Carbon Robotics and LaserWeeder! View recent media coverage.

Why Lasers?

Unlike other weeding technologies, the robots utilize high-power lasers to eradicate weeds using thermal energy, without disturbing the soil. The LaserWeeder™ allows farmers to use less herbicides and reduces labor to remove unwanted plants while improving the reliability and predictability of costs, crop yield, and more.

BETTER THAN

SPRAYING

Laserweeding is safe, more effective than herbicides, and improves yields.

BETTER THAN

HAND WEEDING

Laserweeding automates a grueling task, helping offset labor challenges.

BETTER THAN MECHANICAL WEEDING
